oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Gerber Disbursement
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mardi Gras; finance;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Approximate statement of the Gerber's disbursement"; shows payment to individuals and for supplies; includes estimate for a display of 25 floats, costumes, etc. of $58,000; includes estimate of average cost of float construction, $140-$150; inner page of folding sheet lists daily expenditures from 11/21/76 to 3/7/77; outer page written in pencil, inner in purple ink.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by John Jones
